radiographic_examinations.findings: The liver is normal in echotexture without discrete mass or lesion. No intrahepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The gallbladder is distended with an increased gallbladder wall thickness, measuring 6 mm. Multiple gallstones are identified. Pericholecystic fluid noted. The common bile duct is not dilated measuring 5 mm. The distal pancreatic tail is excluded from view by overlying bowel gas, but visualized portions are unremarkable. No pancreatic duct dilatation evident. The demonstrated portions of the aorta, inferior vena cava and right kidney are unremarkable. No free fluid identified.
